verses.name: Isaiah 28:7
verses.text: But they also have erred through wine, and through strong drink are out of the way; the priest and the prophet have erred through strong drink, they are swallowed up of wine, they are out of the way through strong drink; they err in vision, they stumble in judgment.

verses.name: Isaiah 28:8
verses.text: For all tables are full of vomit and filthiness, so that there is no place clean.

verses.name: Isaiah 28:9
verses.text: Whom shall he teach knowledge? and whom shall he make to understand doctrine? them that are weaned from the milk, and drawn from the breasts.
